thread.title: Mind-mannered Minnesotans find murder and mayhem as 'Fargo' returns
thread.title_full: Mind-mannered Minnesotans find murder and mayhem as 'Fargo' returns - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Mind-mannered Minnesotans find murder and mayhem as 'Fargo' returns
text: LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - The folks in Minnesota might be well-mannered and seemingly ordinary in "Fargo," but behind the polite facades lies something more sinister as a murder most violent kicks off the second season of the television miniseries on Monday. Â»
